items.title: Democrats’ Sudden Obsession With Jeffrey Epstein Is An Opportunistic Ploy To Bash Trump
items.description: There's no damning link between Trump and Jeffrey Epstein, but Democrats have decided to weaponize a serious investigation for political gain.

items.title: Why Raining Justice On The Russia Hoaxers Is So Tricky — And So Important
items.description: Absent justice for the Russia hoax, the lesson to the conspirators is that they should go even bigger next time.
